original_text: Seeing then that I will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked, therefore shall my sword go forth out of his sheath against all flesh from the south to the north:
korean_text: 내가 의인과 악인을 네게서 끊을 터이므로 내 칼을 칼집에서 빼어 모든 육체를 남에서 북까지 치리니

sentences.original_text: Seeing then that I will cut off from thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 너에게서 끊어버릴 것을 보아

sentences.original_text: therefore shall my sword go forth
from the south to the north:
